main event: Three lights were observed flying at a high speed near an Air Force base.
interesting points: The lights were estimated to be traveling at 700 mph and were very bright and flashing,No trail was observed behind the lights,The sighting lasted for about 8-10 minutes,The lights approached very close to an Air Force base in Washington, Missouri,This case was officially investigated and could not be explained.
witness description: members of the Civil Defense organization
